overview: "After a casual hook up between Jayne and Tray in the early stages of lockdown, Jayne, a strikingly independent half-Nigerian half-Jamaican woman, is left feeling alone in dealing with an unplanned pregnancy. In Jayneâ€™s absence, Tray, seeks the friendship of an old flame only to realize how he truly feels about Jayne. In addition to now having to divide their time between their friendships with Jayne and Tray, with the Black Lives Matter movement rising to new heights, Rowe and Chris find themselves on different ends of the spectrum of activism. As Chris becomes more of a leader in the space, Rowe starts dating someone white, and is left feeling like an outsider in his own community. With new life, comes second chances, and the foursome may have one more shot at keeping their group together."
title: Bite of a Mango
